what: Estimate the Lifetime Risk of Developing or Dying from Cancer
title: Estimate the Lifetime Risk of Developing or Dying from Cancer
text: R package used estimate lifetime risk developing dying cancer using Population-Based Cancer Registry data.

title: Estimate the Lifetime Risk of Developing or Dying from Cancer
text: can install development version ltRISK GitHub :

title: Estimate the Lifetime Risk of Developing or Dying from Cancer
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Calculate cumulative mortality risk predefined upper limit age 74 years. can also calculate cumulative incidence risk predefined upper limit age 74 years.

title: Calculate the cumulative rate. — cumrate
text: used calculate cumulative rate defined age limit.

title: Calculate the cumulative rate. — cumrate
code: cumrate(   count,   pop,   rate = NULL,   eage = 70,   agewidth = 5,   sep_zero = TRUE,   mp = 1,   decimal = 5 )

title: Calculate the cumulative rate. — cumrate
text: count Number cases number. pop Number population risk. rate Age specific incidence mortality rate. eage defined age limit calculated cumulative rate. agewidth age band width age specific rate. sep_zero Logical value, 0 age group separate. mp multiplier used scale calculated rates. Default 100. decimal Decimals calculated rates.

title: Calculate the cumulative rate. — cumrate
text: Cumulative rate.

title: Calculate the cumulative rate. — cumrate

text: used calculate cumulative risk based cumulative rate.

title: Calculate the cumulative risk. — cumrisk

text: cumrate Cumulative rate. mp multiplier used scale calculated rates. Default 100. decimal Decimals calculated rates.

title: Calculate the cumulative risk. — cumrisk

what: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
title: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
text: Estimate age conditional probability developing dying cancer

title: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
code: ltr(mi, di, ri, ni, type = "developing", age_width = 5)

title: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
text: mi annual number -cause mortality deaths age group. di annual number cancer-related deaths age group. ri annual number diagnosed cancer cases age group. ni number population age group. type Characters "developing" "dying" indicate estimate probability developing cancer dying . age_width age width age group.

title: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
text: list class ltr: age Age groups. si probability developing dying cancer age group. vari variance estimates age group.

title: Estimate the age conditional probability of developing or dying from cancer — ltr
